reviews.review: I began playing this game when it first hit console, I loved it then, and I love it now.
great game has much fun on it
One of the greatest puzzles games ever made.

This is a square. 
Can you guess which spot that goes in? 
That's right, it goes in the Aperture Science Emergency Intelligence Incinerator.
And how about this rectangle? 
That one, it goes in the Aperture Science Emergency Intelligence Incinerator.
Up next, we got this thin rectangle.
Can you guess where that goes?
Thatâ€™s right, it goes in the Aperture Science Emergency Intelligence Incinerator.
And up next, a cylinder.
Hmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmâ€¦
I think that goes in the Aperture Science Emergency Intelligence Incinerator.
Now, we also got this semi-circle right here. 
Do you see a slot that will fit the semi-circle?
Thatâ€™s right, itâ€™s the Aperture Science Emergency Intelligence Incinerator.
Okay. Up next, the triangle. 
We know what whole that goes into, right?
Thatâ€™s right, the Aperture Science Emergency Intelligence Incinerator.
And up next, we have the arch.
And you guessed it.
It goes in the Aperture Science Emergency Intelligence Incinerator.
